### calculateFragmentIntersect() {#ad7b73b4fea9ae261dfe1d0141e34d55c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::at::calculateFragmentIntersect (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp; DL, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Dest, uint64&#95;t SliceOffsetInBits, uint64&#95;t SliceSizeInBits, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgassignintrinsic">DbgAssignIntrinsic</a> &#42; DbgAssign, std::optional&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diexpression/#a2a09e6caba71ab15519f9e55ceb4d10d">DIExpression::FragmentInfo</a> &gt; &amp; Result)</>}>
Calculate the fragment of the variable in <code>DAI</code> covered from (Dest + SliceOffsetInBits) to to (Dest + SliceOffsetInBits + SliceSizeInBits)

FIXME: Remove this wrapper function and call <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diexpression/#a4ea8623be899e029827af260965c860d">DIExpression::calculateFragmentIntersect</a> directly.

Return false if it can&#39;t be calculated for any reason. Result is set to nullopt if the intersect equals the variable fragment (or variable size) in DAI.

Result contains a zero-sized fragment if there&#39;s no intersect.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfo-h/#l00264">264</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfo-h">DebugInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfo-cpp/#l01971">1971</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfo-cpp">DebugInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getAssignmentInsts() {#a12eb3d832354ce03752e78d9a5df50dd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>AssignmentInstRange llvm::at::getAssignmentInsts (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> &#42; ID)</>}>
Return a range of instructions (typically just one) that have <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a></code> as an attachment.

Iterators invalidated by adding or removing <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> metadata to/from any instruction (including by deleting or cloning instructions).

### getAssignmentMarkers() {#a3c90899e8f022656e511630de42b916c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>AssignmentMarkerRange llvm::at::getAssignmentMarkers (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> &#42; ID)</>}>
Return a range of dbg.assign intrinsics which use \\ID as an operand.

Iterators invalidated by deleting an intrinsic contained in this range.

### remapAssignID() {#a64974d467d808a48c21d2b455ce3ecdd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::at::remapAssignID (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Map, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; I)</>}>
Replace <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> uses and attachments with IDs from <code>Map</code>.

Update inlined instructions&#39; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> metadata.

If an <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> is unmapped a new <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> is generated and added to <code>Map</code>.

We need to do this otherwise a function inlined more than once into the same function will cause <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> to be shared by many instructions.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfo-h/#l00275">275</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfo-h">DebugInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfo-cpp/#l01992">1992</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debuginfo-cpp">DebugInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
